title: ‘One Big, Beautiful Family’
sub_head: Prayers for peace in a violent world.
body:
This time of year brings hope of peace and renewal for a world in desperate need of them. This particular year brings the simultaneous occurrence of Easter, Passover and Ramadan, and perhaps more prayers than usual.
